name: Notion Cover Pack - Niji
description: Introducing "Niji: A Notion Cover Pack". This collection of ten unique cover images brings the exciting Niji style to your digital workspace. Each cover is meticulously crafted in the Niji art style, showcasing a different aspect that will work with your Notion workspaces.The pack includes:YogaCityCoffee ShopMarketplaceBeachGraffitiUniversityTownKitchenMountainThe Niji pack is designed to inspire and invigorate, transforming your Notion workspace into a place of creativity and calm.
